channel.title: Movies on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Movies on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: SVL 1.9: Palo Alto and Cousins
item.description: 13th October 2014 Hello everyone, How are you? Hope you are doing well ðŸ™‚ Here the weather is getting so cold (13C) in the evenings and mornings that we’ve started keeping the windows closed at night.

item.title: LOG 1.13: Spring 'time', German and the 60Â´s
item.description: 31st March, 2011 After some rain last night, the air smells like monsoon in India; so fresh and clean! IÂ´ve opened the window to let it come in and along with it are the chirps and tweets of the birds.

item.title: LOG 1.12: DMT, The Discovery of Dro"gen Hasen Weg and the Super Extreme Moon
item.description: 18th March, 2011 Hello everyone, I watched this video recently. http://www.esoterictube.com/dmt-the-spirit-molecule.html It corresponds with what Joseph Campbell says about the spiritual world (as represented by myths and anecdotes from those who meditate, and shamans), drugs and psychological diseases like schizophrenia.

item.title: A Brave New World of Equilibrium
item.description: The battle between emotion and control is an old one. It is fought by each of us in our lives as well as philosophers at a more conceptual level.

item.title: Unna Nenachen Pattu Padichen: Lyrics and translation
item.description: Here is another Kamal song sung by SPB. This is from the movie Aboorva Sagotharargal where Kamal acts as brothers. One who looks normal and another who is very short.

item.title: Annal Mele Panithuli
item.description: This soft and melodious song comes from the movie Varanam Aayiram. Surya, who has proved his talent several times before, does it again in this movie playing the role of the father and playing the son from his late teens into manhood.

item.title: Vidai Kodu Engal Nade: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This song is from Kannathil Muththam Ittal. It is a touching story about little girl who tries to find her biological mother after finding out she was adopted.

item.title: Fire 1996: Exploring Lesbianism in the controversial contexts of Feminism, Religion and Sexuality
item.description: This bold movie tells the story of two women who are married to brothers in a joint family. Through shared loneliness, they soon start a secret affair within the household.

item.title: Enna Ithu: Feature Spoiler 'Nala Damayanthi '
item.description: If you are in love, you will love this song. The melody has a dreamy and floaty feeling to it and the lyrics describe the wonder and joy of being in love.

item.title: A Study of Communalism and Identity
item.description: A Study of Communalism and Identity (First published in May 2008) I Identities Preferences and Behaviour Where does the self come from? Identity and our definitions of our â€˜selfâ€™ are a result of what weâ€™ve been taught from the beginning of our lives.

item.title: Vasantha Kala Nadigalile: Feature Spoiler
item.description: Talk about twisted! Rajani is a true villian in this song. You must watch the video to understand why, though the audio alone should also suffice.

item.title: Uyire Uyire â€“ Lyrics and Translation
item.description: From the movie Bombay, this is another super-hit from Rahman. Hariharan’s voice makes it take on a etheral quality. And if I may say so, these lyrics far out-beat the Hindi remake.

item.title: Balailakka Balailakka â€“ Lyrics and Translation (with end notes)
item.description: A.R. Rahman had another party with this movie. He has explored several new styles including hip pop in the movie Shivaji â€“ The Boss. Although it has some lines just for the sake of rhyming lyrics(I will mark these with a â€˜*â€™), this song makes me long for home.

item.title: Athisaya Raagam Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This raagam, called Mahati, has only 4 notes. In Karnatic music, all raagams have either 5, 6 or 7 notes. But Balamurali Krishna invented this one and was critisised for his non-traditional innovation.

item.title: Anbe Sivam Lyrics Translation
item.description: The movie this song is from is also called Anbe Sivam. It is one of Kamal HassanÂ´s most poignant movies and I recommend it to everyone if they can find it with subtitles.

item.title: Nine
item.description: Beautiful spirited women and a wreck of a man. All the possible ways to screw up one’s marriage and work, he does it. He hurts people all along the way.

item.title: Kannathil Mutham Ittal
item.description: An honest story about how a young girl learns that she is adopted. Through this story, the larger inner turmoils of Sri Lanka are portrayed. A pregnant newly-wed woman goes to India as a refugee, gives birth and returns to join the movement in her dedication to her husband who believes in Tamil independance.
